name: Pew Pew Rocket
description:
Pew Pew Rocket is a beautiful and spectacular space survival shoot em up with a twist, Instead of lasers and explosions, it combines a beat style game-play such as guitar hero and beautiful firework effects to have you mesmerized!
Pew Pew Rocket mixes 2 great games into one amazing concept.

Relaxing and fast, beautiful and deadly. This game is not like any other!

-The game includes 8 levels each with its unique song to jam to and scoring system.
-A wide range of enemy ships and bosses will keep things interesting each time.
-Each level is random and no level acts the same leading to plenty of replay value.
-The game will also include full controller support and achievements.what are you waiting for?
